mapper.insert: insert into nm_plan( group_no, member_no, start_date, end_date, title, thumbnail, content, address, latitude, longitude ) values( #{groupNo}, #{memberNo}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{title}, #{thumbnail}, #{content}, #{address}, #{latitude}, #{longitude})
mapper.select: select plan_no, title, create_date from nm_plan where group_no=#{groupNo} order by plan_no desc

select plan_no, DATE_FORMAT(start_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') start_date, DATE_FORMAT(end_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') end_date, title, content, thumbnail, DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%H:%i') start_hour, DATE_FORMAT(end_date, '%H:%i') end_hour, address, latitude, longitude, create_date from nm_plan where plan_no=#{planBoardNo}

select plan_no, DATE_FORMAT(start_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') start_date, DATE_FORMAT(end_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') end_date, title, content, thumbnail, DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%H:%i') start_hour, DATE_FORMAT(end_date, '%H:%i') end_hour, address, latitude, longitude, create_date from nm_plan where group_no=#{groupNo} order by plan_no desc
select plan_no, title, create_date from nm_plan where plan_no like #{keywordPattern} or title like #{keywordPattern}
